faq.q: Can I come to the Silver course if I have not attended the Bronze course?
faq.a: Yes you can, if your dog is at the relevant obedience level.

faq.q: Do we have to book into the Silver obedience course?
faq.a: Yes you do have to book into the Silver obedience course, as this is a course that runs for six consecutive weeks.

faq.q: Can children come to the obedience courses?
faq.a: Because the people in the obedience courses are constantly on the move and changing direction, children have to sit on the side and watch. Many do, and they are welcome

faq.q: Do we have to pay in advance when we book into the obedience course?
Does my dog need to have had kennel cough vaccination to come to classes?
faq.a: No your dog does not need to have kennel cough vaccination to come to training classes, but their yearly vaccinations need to be up to date.
They are held at A1K9 Behaviour and Training Academy just outside Pontardulais. (See directions on website)

faq.q: What do I need to bring with me?
faq.a: Collar, lead and some treats that your dogs like to eat. A Bring whatever you have and I will advise you what is best to use with your dog.
You should wear warm clothes and sturdy shoes as we will work outdoors whenever possible.

faq.q: If I miss a week in the Silver course can I have that credited on the next course?
If it is raining will the class be cancelled?
faq.a: No it will be held indoors, in the training barn.
